A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: honestly i dont get why people are so angry at this movie. sure the plot is kinda thin but so much happened in this movie like we got to know who rey's parents were(even tho they were nobodys) \, and ren became the new emperor by killing snoke\, luke died\, rey learned how to use the force and etc. Also the cgi & score was outstanding overall just a great movie
